summary: Improves the Rueful Axe\'s speed among other things making it actually useful as a weapon.
descriptionHtml:
I was really disappointed in weeks before the Creation Kit release I searched the nexus and other sites hoping to find a mod that fixed the Rueful Axe\'s speed and actually made it worth using as a weapon. Now that the CK is here I wanted to make this tiny mod not only for myself but for anyone else who wants it! This mod changes the Rueful Axe in the following ways,

1: Puts it\'s speed on par with the rest of the battle axes.

2: Boosts the damage to put it on par with a daedric battle axe.

3: Removes the damage stamina enchantment.

4: Makes the axe enchantable so you can enchant it however you want.

Enjoy!
author: Camondeck
